content:
An orientation meeting for the FHIR Shorthand Sydney Connectathon will be held (this is a single meeting ... but occurs on different days in different time zones):

  • Tuesday January 21, 5-6 pm Eastern US time (GMT-5)
  • Wednesday, January 22, 9-10 am, Sydney Daylight Time (GMT+11)
    JOIN: https://meet.mitre.org/mkramer/0SM9YVQV
    +1 (781) 271-2020,,9785794# (US) English (United States)
    +1 (703) 983-2020,,9785794# (US) English (United States)
    Conference ID: 9785794
    For more information on the track, see https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-02+FHIR+Shorthand+Track
    Please sign up on the Confluence page if you plan to attend the Connectathon.
